definition: (Middle Ages) flexible armor made of interlinked metal rings, cause to be directed or transmitted to another place
details:
noun
- (Middle Ages) flexible armor made of interlinked metal rings
= synonyms: chain mail
- a conveyance that transports the letters and packages that are conveyed by the postal system
- the system whereby messages are transmitted via the post office
= example: the system whereby messages are transmitted via the post office
= synonyms: post
- the bags of letters and packages that are transported by the postal service
- any particular collection of letters or packages that is delivered
= example: any particular collection of letters or packages that is delivered
= synonyms: post
verb
- cause to be directed or transmitted to another place
= synonyms: post
- send via the postal service
= example: send via the postal service
= synonyms: get off
